params._lendingPool: Address of the lending pool associated with the position
params._user: Address of the user who will own the position

returns._0: Address of the newly deployed position contract

deployPosition(address,address).notice: Deploys a new position contract for a user

setOwner(address).notice: Sets the owner of the deployer contract
